alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Bibb; Jasper; Jones; Monroe; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 7:24PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Baldwin, northern Bibb, southwestern Putnam, southeastern Monroe, Jones and southeastern Jasper Counties through 800 PM EST... At 723 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was near Dames Ferry, or 7 miles west of Gray, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Milledgeville, Gray, Payne, Payne City, Midway-Hardwick, Meriwether, Postell, Bradley, Wayside, Allenwood, Resseaus Crossroads, Round Oak, Plant Harlee Branch, Wesleyan, Arkwright, Browns Crossing, Juliette, Ethridge and James. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Bibb; Jasper; Jones; Monroe; Putnam
